description: Labrynna's entertainment divisions have long used strange beasts from foreign lands, their Zoos would be more than willing to take these creatures off their hands after the people had become bored of their performances.
tooltip: Labrynna's entertainment divisions have long used strange beasts from foreign lands, their Zoos would be more than willing to take these creatures off their hands after the people had become bored of their performances. (Reduces total resource cost of all Creature units by 15%)
